summary: Updated system-overview.md to remove inaccurate context:fork and agent: frontmatter claims. Added comprehensive documentation of three skill architecture patterns (A: delegating with internal postflight, B: direct execution, C: orchestrator). Converted all diagrams to Unicode box-drawing characters. Added command-skill-agent mapping matrix covering all 11 commands. Reconciled agent and user documentation with Last Verified dates and cross-references.

artifacts.summary: Updated architecture reference with corrected frontmatter examples, skill patterns, Unicode diagrams, and command mapping matrix
Added Last Verified metadata and cross-reference to agent-facing documentation
